com.avanza.astrix.provider.core

Annotation Type AstrixApplication


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
public @interface AstrixApplication
    Used to define what services a given Astrix server provides.

    Note that @AstrixApplication annotated classes are not found using classpath scanning. To load the server part of the framework and start providing services defined by an @AstrixApplication the annotated class must be explicitly identified, for instance by setting the com.avanza.astrix.spring.AstrixFrameworkBean#setApplicationDescriptor property.

    Author:
    Elias Lindholm (elilin)

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Class<?>[] apiDescriptors
      Deprecated. 
      renamed to exportsRemoteServicesFor
      String component
      Deprecated. 
      renamed to defaultServiceComponent
      String defaultServiceComponent
      Default ServiceComponent to use when exporting services provided by this application, see AstrixServiceComponentNames for well known ServiceComponent's.
      Class<?>[] exportsRemoteServicesFor
      Defines a list of AstrixApiProviders (i.e api's) that this application provides remote service endpoints for.

    • Element Detail

      • exportsRemoteServicesFor

        public abstract Class<?>[] exportsRemoteServicesFor
        Defines a list of AstrixApiProviders (i.e api's) that this application provides remote service endpoints for. All services defined in the given api's (@Service annotated methods) will be provided by this application.
        Returns:
        Default:
        {}

      • apiDescriptors

        @Deprecated
public abstract Class<?>[] apiDescriptors
        Deprecated. renamed to exportsRemoteServicesFor
        Defines a list of AstrixApiProviders that this application provides remote service endpoints for. All services defined in the given api's (@Service annotated methods) will be provided by this application.
        Returns:
        Default:
        {}

      • defaultServiceComponent

        public abstract String defaultServiceComponent
        Default ServiceComponent to use when exporting services provided by this application, see AstrixServiceComponentNames for well known ServiceComponent's. This might be overriden on a per service basis by setting the Service.value() property on a given service.
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""

      • component

        @Deprecated
public abstract String component
        Deprecated. renamed to defaultServiceComponent
        Default ServiceComponent to use when exporting services provided by this application, see AstrixServiceComponentNames for well known ServiceComponent's. This might be overriden on a per service basis by setting the Service.value() property on a given service.
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""
